extensionAttribute.description: This attribute displays the inventory of a Windows virtual machine in Parallels Desktop for Mac.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/sh currentUser=`ls -l /dev/console | awk {'print $3'}` sharedApplicationDir=`ls /Users/$currentUser/Applications\ \(Parallels\)/ | grep {` sharedBaseDir="/Users/$currentUser/Applications (Parallels)" individualApplicationDir=
echo "<result>`ls "$baseDir/$applicationDir" | grep .app`</result>"
